#include <iostream>
#include "bits/stdc++.h"
using namespace std;

int main() {
	int t;
	  scanf("%d",&t);
	 while(t--)
	 {
	   long long a=1,b=2,x;
	   long  long ans=0;
	      scanf("%lld",&x);
	     while(1)
	     {
	     	if(x<=a)
	     	  break;
	     	  long long g=a;
	     	  a=b;
	     	b=g+b;
	     //	cout<<a<<" "<<b<<endl;
	     	
	     	  ans++;
	     }
	    if(x<a)
	      ans--;
	     printf("%lld\n",ans);
	 }
	return 0;
}
